QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, date_start, date_end, case when lower(benefit_type) = 'medical' then 1 when lower(benefit_type) = 'pharmacy' or benefit_type is null then 2 end as benefit_type, data_vendor FROM {sc}.enrollment JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, null as date_start, null as date_end, NULL as benefit_type, data_vendor FROM {sc}.medical_claims JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, null as date_start, null as date_end, NULL as benefit_type, data_vendor FROM {sc}.pharmacy_claims JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, patient_gender, patient_year_of_birth, null as date_start, null as date_end, NULL as benefit_type, data_vendor FROM {sc}.events JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE ) select a.* from a order by 1
